original_text: For the whole house of Ahab shall perish: and I will cut off from Ahab him that pisseth against the wall, and him that is shut up and left in Israel:
korean_text: 아합의 온 집이 멸망하리니 이스라엘 중에 매인자나 놓인 자나 아합에게 속한 모든 남자는 내가 다 멸절하되

sentences.original_text: For the whole house of Ahab shall perish
and I will cut off from Ahab
him that pisseth against the wall
and him that is shut up and left in Israel
